text: <!channel> Sputnik request: Does anyone have friends or family members in law enforcement who could answer some questions for the team today or tomorrow? Phone or in person will work and it won’t take more than an hour.
do they have to be local?
and do you mean police or the judicial system?
active law enforcement or is retired okay? (mine would be east coast)
I’ve got someone who can help too, but they only worked in the bay.
<@U167FL70V> both judicial and police. <@U13GPDA1F> probably active would be best <@U0U9WJB7F> the bay is fine. If you could get me in contact with them that’d be swell. email or phone.
<@U0GN0A9EV> I know an active police officer out in colorado
<@U0GN0A9EV> My friend Juan is a lawyer and can talk this afternoon.
<@U0GN0A9EV> i know quite a few district attorneys in Los Angeles, im sure they would be willing to talk
i know of someones husband ... not sure if he has time though … what’s the area of questions and is there something in it for him?
Thanks for your help everyone! We got what we needed.
